attributes.review: when i got this app i was so excited to support the demon himself donald trump, BUT my screen started glitching out and a big orange thingy with a mop on its head appeared on my screen and now i have reoccurring nightmares. please do not download this app, i will never sleep well again...
attributes.title: i am extremely disappointed...

attributes.review: never in my entire life have i ever ever been more disgusted by an app on the appstore. the apple app store used to be a good place, full of fun and laughter and magic and love and love making, but once i found this app (☹️) my life went from mildly average to unmistakably awful. i wish i never had to see this app, or the name associated. in fact, i wish he died 💀☠️! it would definitely make my life just a little better if he was just erased of the face of the earth. stan bernie for clear skin, flourishing crops, and good grades. blessed be ❤️

I’ve been dry heaving since 6am.

attributes.review: This app took ages to download, about 3-4 days to be exact, and when it did download it made my phone glitch so badly, I tried to fix it but it wouldn’t work, I also got some ugly creepy pictures coming outta here. Would definitely not recommend.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app made me wish there was a 0 star review or maybe even negative. But this has made me pro Kanye West. 🤧🤧
